mapper.update: update CRE_RULE_LOG set OUTPUT_DATA = #{outputData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION = #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into CRE_RULE_LOG
LOG_ID,
Rule_ID,
FOLDER_ID,
STATE,
HIT_RULE_NUM,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
INPUT_DATA,
OUTPUT_DATA,
EXCEPTION,
CONSUMER_ID,
CONSUMER_SEQ_NO,
USE_TIME,
RETURN_CODE,
MODEL_VERSION,
MODEL_TYPE,
RETURN_RESULT,
RETURN_SCORE,
PROJECT_NO,
#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hitRuleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outputData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{consumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{consumerSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{useTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{methodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returnResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returnScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectNo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select f.DEPT_ID as deptId, e.CHANNEL_ID as channelId, f.DEPT_NAME as deptName, e.CHANNEL_NAME as channelName, c.MODEL_GROUP_ID as groupId, b.RULE_ID as modelId, c.MODEL_GROUP_NAME as groupName, b.MODULE_NAME as modelName, a.METHOD_TYPE as methodType, a.CONSUMER_SEQ_NO as consumerSeqNo, a.RETURN_CODE as returnCode, a.START_TIME as startTime, a.END_TIME as endTime
from CRE_RULE_LOG a left join CRE_RULE_DETAIL b on a.RULE_ID = b.RULE_ID left join CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP c on a.FOLDER_ID = c.MODEL_GROUP_ID left join CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP_CHANNEL d on c.MODEL_GROUP_ID = d.MODEL_GROUP_ID left join CRE_AUTH_CHANNEL e on e.CHANNEL_ID = d.CHANNEL_ID left join CRE_AUTH_DEPT f on e.DEPT_ID = f.DEPT_ID where a.LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
